Virginia Injury Lawyers

Focused on Workers’ Comp, Personal Injury, & Social Security Disability

If you’ve been injured on the job, suffered a work-related medical condition, or were harmed by the negligent or wrongful conduct of another, Reinhardt | Harper | Davis can help. As one of Virginia’s top workers’ compensation, personal injury, and Social Security disability law firms, we are recognized as a leader in injury law. Together, our attorneys have more than 100 years of experience and a long history of success, having secured millions of dollars in compensation for our clients. With offices in Richmond, Fredericksburg, Charlottesville, and Prince William County, we assist injured individuals and families throughout the entire state.

Founded in 1980, Reinhardt | Harper | Davis has earned a reputation within the community for our commitment to our clients and our dedication to pursuing the full, fair recoveries they are owed. We are trusted by honest, hardworking Virginians and legal professionals alike; fellow attorneys frequently call our team about their workers’ compensation and personal injury cases. We are the only law firm in Richmond with three lawyers recognized by Best Lawyers® in Workers’ Compensation – Claimants, and our firm is known for having successfully handled the four largest workers’ compensation cases in the state.

If you or someone you love was injured on the job, involved in a serious car accident, or otherwise harmed due to someone else’s negligent or wrongful conduct, contact us at (804) 294-2966 for a free consultation.

A Team You Can Trust

Getting back on your feet after a serious accident or injury can be extremely difficult. When you’re already focused on getting critical medical care and managing your everyday expenses while out of work, the thought of finding an attorney to help with your claim can feel overwhelming.

When you turn to the team at Reinhardt | Harper | Davis, you can be confident knowing that our highly experienced and proven team will handle every legal detail of your case. Our Virginia injury lawyers are supported by a team of knowledgeable and skilled paralegals, as well as a compassionate support staff, all of whom are dedicated to helping you navigate the legal process. As a client, you can rely on us to provide consistent communication and updates on the status of your case, as well as answers to your questions and the ongoing support you need.

After a work-related injury, a serious accident, or the tragic loss of a loved one, trust your recovery to Reinhardt | Harper | Davis. We invite you to reach out to our Virginia workers’ compensation and personal injury lawyers today to schedule a free, no-obligation consultation.

Call (804) 294-2966 or contact us online to get started.

About Richmond, Virginia

Richmond is the capital of Virginia. It was founded in 1737 by a wealthy landowner. Colonel William Byrd II inherited land on both sides of the James River, where he began developing the city. Today, it is a bustling town, and as of 2020 has a population of about 230,000 people. The city is home to many historical landmarks. Each year, tourists come to visit Maymont, a lovely, 100-acre Victorian estate converted into a public park and museum. Visitors will also find the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts and the Lewis Ginter Botanical Garden. Today, the city acts as a hub for government, law, and finance.
